list.title: EmbedBuilder#addField
list.description: Adds a field to the embed.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#build
list.description: Compiles the data into an HTML object for Nerimity.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#setAuthor
list.description: Sets the author of the embed.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#setBackground
list.description: Sets the background color of the embed.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#setBorder
list.description: Sets the color of the outer border.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#setColor
list.description: Sets a solid accent color for the side strip.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#setDescription
list.description: Sets the main description of the embed.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#setFooter
list.description: Sets the footer text.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#setGradient
list.description: Sets a vertical gradient for the side accent strip.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#setHeaderColor
list.description: Sets the color for Title and Field headers.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#setImage
list.description: Sets the main large image at the bottom.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#setRadius
list.description: Sets the border radius of the embed corners.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#setText
list.description: Sets the color for description and field values.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#setTheme
list.description: Quickly applies an accent and background color theme.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#setThumbnail
list.description: Sets the top-right thumbnail image.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#setTimestamp
list.description: Appends a UTC timestamp to the footer.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#setTitle
list.description: Sets the title of the embed.

list.title: EmbedBuilder#setWidth
list.description: Sets the total width of the embed.

list.title: checkCooldown
list.description: Check and apply cooldown for a command.

list.title: commands
list.description: Stores all loaded commands from /commands. Keys are command names, values are command objects.

list.title: fileCommandMap
list.description: Maps the original file path > command name. Used to maintain command consistency.

list.title: loadCommandFile
list.description: Load a single command file from disk.

list.title: loadCommands
list.description: Load all commands from /commands.

list.title: loadDir
list.description: Recursively load all commands inside the /commands directory.

list.title: logSummary
list.description: Print a formatted summary of all loaded commands.

list.title: module.exports
list.description:
Help Command

Displays all available commands grouped by category.

Command Object Structure: { name: "help", description: "Displays all available commands", async execute(message, args, client) {} }

list.title: module.exports
list.description:
Ping Command

Displays the bot's response latency.

list.title: module.exports.execute
list.description: Execute the help command.

list.title: module.exports.execute
list.description: Execute the ping command.

list.title: module.exports.execute
list.description: Executes the testembed command.

list.title: module.exports.execute~categories
list.description: Group commands by category. Structure: { "Fun": [cmd1, cmd2], "General": [cmd3] }
